caption.p: Quantification of Flow Cytometry Plots from Fig. 1. Mean Fluorescent Intensity (MFI) for the histogram plots represented in Fig. 1 (N = 3) were quantitated relative to unstimulated and plotted in bar graphs along with standard error shown in errors bars across experiments. The plots from Fig. 1B are shown in A and the plots from Fig. 1C are shown in B.
